content: crochet along - free crochet pattern **how a free crochet along works** * **the free version of each part will be available on my blog ** * click here 1 to join my fb group for pattern support and to share your progress photos * click here 2 to subscribe to my blog to get an email notification sent to you each time i publish a part **cal dates** * pattern preamble - friday 21 june 2024 * part 1 / squares a - friday 28 june 2024 * part 2 / squares b - friday 5 july 2024 * part 3 / joining / border - friday 12 july 2024 **what you will crochet** * i designed this blanket using some not so traditional granny squares which are joined together as you go * the blanket has a simple border creating a 3d kaleidoscope effect **finished size** * this blanket is made up of squares you can make your blanket larger or smaller by adapting the number of squares you make * 3 x 3 square blanket 113 x 113 cm 45 x 45 inches - measured from edge of border to edge of border * 3 x 4 rectangle blanket 113 x 150 cm 45 x 60 inches - measured from edge of border to edge of border * 4 x 5 rectangle blanket 150 x 187 cm 60 x 74 inches - measured from edge of border to edge of border **crochet skill** * easy/adventurous beginner **terminology** * my pattern is written using us terminology **what you need** * 3 5 mm hook * sewing needle * scissors * stitch markers **yarn requirements** * i used a blended yarn 50% cotton and 50% bamboo to design this blanket you can make the blanket in any yarn just remember to use the correct hook size for the yarn you have chosen * for the 3 x 3 square blanket i used 32 x 50g balls dk/light worsted 50% cotton/50% bamboo viscose blended yarn 1600g / 3456m / 3776yds / 56oz * for the 3 x 4 rectangle blanket i used 41 x 50g balls dk/light worsted 50% cotton/50% bamboo viscose blended yarn 2050g / 4428m / 4838yds / 71 75oz * for the 4 x 5 rectangle blanket i used 63 x 50g balls dk/light worsted 50% cotton/50% bamboo viscose blended yarn 3150g / 6804m / 7434yds / 110 25oz **the full pattern is available to purchase -
